Text: Can anyone please upload the 1080p in about 4-5gb file size. Thank you in advance !

Not sure about anybody else, but its lagging in high motion scenes.

Radeon HD 4250, VLC Media Player

Pretty sure its the video, because the audio plays fine during the lag.

Made the video still watchable but not enjoyable. ):
Awsome upload picture perfect these 1080 p's are way better and more clearer then the 720 and thanks for being generious and sharing .

O and 1 more thing does anybody happen to know how to start the movie where you left off from on VLC that is the only issue im having is when I quit the movie and want to go and do something else and come back like 2 hours later I cant seem to get it to restart exacly where it left off from and thanks to whoever can help me with this and ive checked the preferences and could not find it there .

http://wiki.videolan.org/How_to_save_bookmarks

How to bookmark videos in VLC. I haven't read it myself because I personally believe just pausing it and coming back later is fine, or even starting a few minutes back so I get caught up on what is happening again instead of jumping back into exactly where I was.

Looking over that VLC wiki, it doesn't seem to be the most elegant or reliable solution and you're better off using another video player if this is a big issue for you.

Here's an article explaining how to do it for WMP via a plugin and KMP which is (almost?) just as great as VLC to most people.

http://www.makeuseof.com/tag/bookmark-videos-resume-left/

Sorry for the multiple posts, (this place could use an edit/delete).

It's actually really easy in VLC now that I try it.

The Bookmark option is under Tools > Bookmark (Ctrl + B)

The only way these are usable though are if you load the movie by going to View > Playlist (you have had to open the movie in VLC at least once before for it to show here).

When a video is loaded that particular way, you can open the bookmark list up and go back to certain saved spots in movies with VLC.
Volume could have been louder and the picture had several watery blemishes at times. Nevertheless, thank you for the effort.
